item.title: Nostr-as-a-Service: Using NIP-29 (Groups) to Replace Centralized Slack/Discord for Dev Teams
item.author: libretechsystems@placeq.com (Libretech Systems)
item.description: In the landscape of 2026, the dominance of centralized communication platforms like Slack and Discord is facing its first structural challenge.
